SELECT account.id, account.username, account.name, account.phone, fail_num, late_num, success_num, all_ct_num - fail_num - late_num - success_num null_num, all_ct_num - success_num not_pass_num, all_ct_num
FROM student_course LEFT JOIN course ON student_course.course_id = course.id JOIN account ON student_course.student_id = account.id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN state = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS fail_num, SUM(CASE WHEN state = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS late_num, SUM(CASE WHEN state = 3 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS success_num, student_id cnt_stu_id, course_id FROM sign JOIN class_time ON class_time.id = sign.class_time_id GROUP BY cnt_stu_id, course_id ) AS cnt ON (student_course.student_id = cnt.cnt_stu_id and student_course.course_id = cnt.course_id) JOIN ( SELECT count(course_id) all_ct_num, course_id FROM class_time GROUP BY course_id) AS ct ON student_course.course_id = ct.course_id WHERE student_course.course_id = #{arg0} order by account.username
